name: HeartBeat (Winged Adventurer)
description:
DESCRIPTION

Listen to the Heart of the game and follow its Beats. Take a journey as a Square and unravel the mysterious and rhythmical world filled with deadly shapes. Your purpose is yet to be found.

NOTICE

Due to legal issues, the game is considered frozen and won't be released on Steam any time soon.

FEATURES

  • Simplicity and minimalism
  • 99 levels (18 boss levels)
  • 9 different enemies
  • Unique visual and auditory rhythm for every level
  • HARD, gaming skills are recommended

CONTACT

Send an email to wingedadventurer@gmail.com
